lines.text: What's the matter?
It tastes funny.
What tastes funny?
The water.
It's the minerals in it. It's good for you.
It makes the vegetables taste weird.
Everything's gonna be ok Frances... Daddys gonna protect you... sure thing... Hail Mary full of grace, how's your garden grow?
Nathan, what is wrong with your chickens?

And the third angel sounded, And their fell a great star from heaven, Burning as it were, a torch, and it fell upon the third part of the rivers, and abound the fountains of waters, and many men died of the waters, Revelations of Saint John, chapter 8. Our fruit is full of Worms, All my animals are dying, devoured by this terrible curse. You Frances, You've turn all nasty and ugly, almost overnight. I can hardly recognize you. You know why Frances? Because God is punishing all of us... Your sins have soiled our home, and in still their Wrath.
How's the well coming?
Well, I'm hoping to hook up sometime tomorrow.
Where's Zachary?
He'll be around.
He was stinking up the whole house.

O Lord, we thank thee for the food we are about to receive. We know that we stand in the danger of damnation and hellfire, and that the Lord hates a sinner. But with your grace, we will become pure as the driven snow. Amen.
What are ya doing back there?
Connect the dots.
Frances! Go up stairs... Pray for Salvation.
Eat your eggs Wil... We want you to grow up big and strong now don't we.

[slaps Zachary in the face]
We don't bring strangers into our private business unless I say so. Do you understand?
I thought she needed help.
[Nathan slaps Zachary in the face again and then Cyrus trips him]
Biscuits a little dry this morning Frances. You Forget to add something?
